option.name: notice
option.value:
Copyright (c) $originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-", "$today.year")$today.year $username SPDX-FileCopyrightText: $originalComment.match("SPDX-FileCopyrightText: (\d+)", 1, "-", "$today.year")$today.year $username SPDX-License-Identifier: LGPL-3.0-or-later
